page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KEVIN AGED 12YRS} I wake up about 7.30am,but it takes about ten minutes for me to get my clothes on.I get washed and I clean my teeth and go though to the living room to get my breakfast of cereal,tea and toast.When I have finished I get ready for school.My mum gets my packed lunch made up.I leave home about 8.45am.When I get to school I play football until the bell 9.00am.I play football at playtime and dinnertime which starts at 12.30pm until 1.30pm after dinnertime there are no more breaks until 3.15pm that is hometime.When I get home I sometimes play on my computer or play football until tea time.After my tea I go to my friends house or play on my bike.I go in at 9.00pm and go to bed at 10.00pm.When I grow up I would like to be a computer programmer.
